removeOrganizerAndCleanupEvents(String, String, OrganizerDB.DeleteOrganizerCallback) - Static method in class com.example.fairdraw.DBs.OrganizerDB
Remove an organizer and clean up their events in a single batch: - Delete events with no endDate or endDate in the future (current/ongoing/upcoming) - For past events (endDate in the past) set organizer -> "Unknown organizer" - Delete the organizer document All operations are committed in one WriteBatch so they succeed or fail together.
